spec.name: Sidi Ahmed Ben Lahcen Mausoleum
spec.description: The Sidi Ahmed Ben Lahcen Mausoleum (Marabout de Sidi Ahmed Ben Lahcen) is a local religious shrine located outside the immediate city center. It is dedicated to a local saint, Sidi Ahmed Ben Lahcen, and serves as a traditional site for veneration and seeking spiritual blessings (baraka) within the Moroccan Sufi tradition. These mausoleums are integral to the cultural and religious life of the local community.
items: tomb of sidi ahmed ben lahcen
